entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:10 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.5°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.4 kPa

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
